title: Business Analyst
description:
Job Description

Job Purpose

Do You Want To Join An International Team Working To Expand On The Largest End To End US Mortgage Platform? This Is An Opportunity To Build a Career Building Out a Platform Focused On


Developer enablement
Security
Reusable tooling
Communication


We build the cool, stable foundation that helps our application, partner and lender developers build new and innovative products to help borrowers realize the dream of home ownership.

Responsibilities


Work under the direction of a product manager to break down requirements and author user stories with complete acceptance criteria for development and QA teams to execute
As new solutions are developed, work with product and engineering teams to author processes to define repeatable use of components
Work with implementation team and product manager on go to market documentation for external consumption and integration
Work with product manager to define priorities for scrum team work to accomplish commitments
Work within one or more scrum teams, providing direction to teams working on implementation and testing of assigned features
Work with implementation teams to estimate efforts associated with new work
Experience with agile development methodologies and product management practices


Knowledge And Experience


5+ years of experience
Undergraduate degree required - Computer science preferred, but can be combination of some CS knowledge with business
Good technical writing skills - working with developers to be able to write documentation for developers to get rapid and high quality integration with platform APIs.
Good interpersonal skills
Strong problem-solving skills
Mortgage industry experience (preferred) or financial services industry experience
Familiarity with cloud-based platforms and technologies (preferred)
Experience with agile development methodologies and product management practices (preferred)


Schedule

This role offers work from home flexibility of one day per week.
